element-citation.article-title: Molluscicidal action of the latex of Euphorbia splendens var. hislopii N.E.B. (“Christʼs Crown”) (Euphorbiaceae) against Lymnaea columella (Say, 1817) (Pulmonata: Lymnaeidae), intermediate host of Fasciola hepatica Linnaeus, 1758 (Trematode: Fasciolidae): 1- test in laboratory
